long_description: Chances are you'll find yourself pulling the organic cotton Patagonia Chambray shirt out of the laundry to wear again before it makes it to the washer. This stylish fall favorite is ultra comfortable. Made from breathable, lightweight organic cotton chambray. Two button-adjustable cuffs; flapped chest pockets; straight, hip-length hem. Patagonia Chambray shirt offers a regular fit.
